law.text:
The Department shall:
annually make:
a list that includes the name, position, term of office, and salary of each civil officer whom the Governor appointed during the preceding calendar year; and
a list that includes the name, position, term of office, and salary of each civil officer whose term expires during the current calendar year;
send a copy of each list to each member of the General Assembly; and
make the lists available to any person who requests them; and
include on the lists only civil officers whom the Governor appoints, subject to the approval of the Senate or the House of Delegates.
